trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Gresham
There were no other sightings in Gresham on or around September 2nd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsLast night my daughter(9) and I arrived home and saw in the western sky, halfway up the horizon lights in the sky hovering and weaving back and forth.they moved faster than any aircraft ive seen, but it was not jerky motion.Could not capture with cell phone camera.watched it for an hour and it descended low beyond buildings, and I lost site of it.tried searching but was unsuccessful.other neighbors witnessed also.looked at the lights with binocs.could not identify,very strange.very bright l.e.d. lights but bigger, and close together, shimmering.as if invisible sphere was searching for something.
Summary: Bright led lights (big) almost vertical in sky. witnessed reflection from lights on underneath invisible dome
